sql2: SELECT title_type, COUNT(*) FROM ratings GROUP BY title_type;
sql3: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date_rated) AS year_of_rating, COUNT(*) FROM ratings GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
sql4: SELECT year, COUNT(*) FROM ratings GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
sql5: SELECT title, your_rating FROM ratings ORDER BY your_rating DESC LIMIT 10;
sql6: SELECT title, your_rating FROM ratings ORDER BY your_rating LIMIT 10;
sql7: SELECT genres from ratings ORDER BY imdb_rating DESC;
sql8: SELECT imdb_rating, COUNT(*) FROM ratings GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
